name: sssnek
description:
Its snake! yay! who dosen't love snake?

This is the first game I've made with pico-8. its still a very early version. I plan to add a few more modes, and fix the controls a little (they can be a little odd sometimes)

Normal mode - just your average game of snake

Wall mode - walls randomly appear every time you eat an apple

Stats menu - because why not?
